00030 #ifndef _LIBCFS_CRYPTO_H
00031 #define _LIBCFS_CRYPTO_H
00032 
00033 struct cfs_crypto_hash_type {
00034         char            *cht_name;      
00036         unsigned int    cht_key;        
00038         unsigned int    cht_size;       
00039 };
00040 
00041 enum cfs_crypto_hash_alg {
00042         CFS_HASH_ALG_NULL       = 0,
00043         CFS_HASH_ALG_ADLER32,
00044         CFS_HASH_ALG_CRC32,
00045         CFS_HASH_ALG_MD5,
00046         CFS_HASH_ALG_SHA1,
00047         CFS_HASH_ALG_SHA256,
00048         CFS_HASH_ALG_SHA384,
00049         CFS_HASH_ALG_SHA512,
00050         CFS_HASH_ALG_CRC32C,
00051         CFS_HASH_ALG_MAX,
00052         CFS_HASH_ALG_UNKNOWN    = 0xff
00053 };
00054 
00055 static struct cfs_crypto_hash_type hash_types[] = {
00056         [CFS_HASH_ALG_NULL]     = { "null",      0,      0 },
00057         [CFS_HASH_ALG_ADLER32]  = { "adler32",   1,      4 },
00058         [CFS_HASH_ALG_CRC32]    = { "crc32",    ~0,      4 },
00059         [CFS_HASH_ALG_CRC32C]   = { "crc32c",   ~0,      4 },
00060         [CFS_HASH_ALG_MD5]      = { "md5",       0,     16 },
00061         [CFS_HASH_ALG_SHA1]     = { "sha1",      0,     20 },
00062         [CFS_HASH_ALG_SHA256]   = { "sha256",    0,     32 },
00063         [CFS_HASH_ALG_SHA384]   = { "sha384",    0,     48 },
00064         [CFS_HASH_ALG_SHA512]   = { "sha512",    0,     64 },
00065         [CFS_HASH_ALG_MAX]      = { NULL,        0,     64 },
00066 };
00067 
00068 /* Maximum size of hash_types[].cht_size */
00069 #define CFS_CRYPTO_HASH_DIGESTSIZE_MAX 64
00070 
00079 static inline const struct
00080 cfs_crypto_hash_type *cfs_crypto_hash_type(enum cfs_crypto_hash_alg hash_alg)
00081 {
00082         struct cfs_crypto_hash_type *ht;
00083 
00084         if (hash_alg < CFS_HASH_ALG_MAX) {
00085                 ht = &hash_types[hash_alg];
00086                 if (ht->cht_name != NULL)
00087                         return ht;
00088         }
00089         return NULL;
00090 }
00091 
00100 static inline const
00101 char *cfs_crypto_hash_name(enum cfs_crypto_hash_alg hash_alg)
00102 {
00103         const struct cfs_crypto_hash_type *ht;
00104 
00105         ht = cfs_crypto_hash_type(hash_alg);
00106         if (ht)
00107                 return ht->cht_name;
00108 
00109         return "unknown";
00110 }
00111 
00120 static inline
00121 unsigned int cfs_crypto_hash_digestsize(enum cfs_crypto_hash_alg hash_alg)
00122 {
00123         const struct cfs_crypto_hash_type *ht;
00124 
00125         ht = cfs_crypto_hash_type(hash_alg);
00126         if (ht != NULL)
00127                 return ht->cht_size;
00128 
00129         return 0;
00130 }
00131 
00138 static inline unsigned char cfs_crypto_hash_alg(const char *algname)
00139 {
00140         enum cfs_crypto_hash_alg hash_alg;
00141 
00142         for (hash_alg = 0; hash_alg < CFS_HASH_ALG_MAX; hash_alg++)
00143                 if (strcmp(hash_types[hash_alg].cht_name, algname) == 0)
00144                         return hash_alg;
00145 
00146         return CFS_HASH_ALG_UNKNOWN;
00147 }
00148 
00149 int cfs_crypto_hash_digest(enum cfs_crypto_hash_alg hash_alg,
00150                            const void *buf, unsigned int buf_len,
00151                            unsigned char *key, unsigned int key_len,
00152                            unsigned char *hash, unsigned int *hash_len);
00153 
00154 /* cfs crypto hash descriptor */
00155 struct cfs_crypto_hash_desc;
00156 
00157 struct cfs_crypto_hash_desc *
00158         cfs_crypto_hash_init(enum cfs_crypto_hash_alg hash_alg,
00159                              unsigned char *key, unsigned int key_len);
00160 int cfs_crypto_hash_update_page(struct cfs_crypto_hash_desc *desc,
00161                                 struct page *page, unsigned int offset,
00162                                 unsigned int len);
00163 int cfs_crypto_hash_update(struct cfs_crypto_hash_desc *desc, const void *buf,
00164                            unsigned int buf_len);
00165 int cfs_crypto_hash_final(struct cfs_crypto_hash_desc *desc,
00166                           unsigned char *hash, unsigned int *hash_len);
00167 int cfs_crypto_register(void);
00168 void cfs_crypto_unregister(void);
00169 int cfs_crypto_hash_speed(enum cfs_crypto_hash_alg hash_alg);
00170 #endif
